attributes.action: lower the age to 9yrs from 10yrs so a child who commits the crime does the time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
fight for the age to be lowered of a child who commits an offence to 9yrs from 10yrs so they can face prosecution,
I am a mum to four, my 8yr was attacked with a metal pole by a 9yr for no reason, he suffered head injuries the police are unable to do anything due to the fact he’s under 10yrs, my child did nothing does not socialise or mix with this child, also this child had be reported before, when is enough, and if someone hadn't stopped him when would he of stopped, please give your support and keep children save. thank you
